Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Lena yincwadi engenakungabaza kuyo, ingumholi kulabo abesaba uMvelinqangi
Nalabo abakholwa kulokho okwambulelwa wena nalokho okwambulelwa labo abangaphambilini kwakho, futhi benesiqiniseko ngempilo ezayo
Labo-ke basekuholweni okuvela eNkosini yabo, futhi yilabo abaphumelelayo
